name: 0-starPixel_2
description: A pixel sorting effect that applies manipulation strictly within a segmented area, allowing for precise and isolated visual transformations.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Sets the minimum brightness value for pixels to be considered for sorting. Only affects pixels within the segmented area.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Sets the maximum brightness value for pixels to be considered for sorting. Only affects pixels within the segmented area.
paramDescriptions.angle: Rotates the segmented area by the specified angle before sorting.
paramDescriptions.contrast: Adjusts the contrast of the sorted pixels within the segmented area.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Modifies the saturation of the sorted pixels within the segmented area.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Determines the resolution factor for pixel sorting; higher values mean lower resolution.
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Adds a specified amount of noise to the sorted pixels within the segmented area.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: Controls the scale of the noise pattern applied to the sorted area.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Defines the direction of the pixel sorting: 0 for vertical, 1 for horizontal.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Selects the basis for pixel sorting: 0 = Hue, 1 = Saturation, 2 = Lightness.
